programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The French city and circuit of Le Mans are synonymous with motorsport - having hosted two and four wheel races and endurance events for many years. Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP™ calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to France’s significant racing heritage.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Main Event - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The French city and circuit of Le Mans are synonymous with motorsport - having hosted two and four wheel races and endurance events for many years. Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP™ calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to France’s significant racing heritage.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Main Event - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep8
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep22
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush
